experience.title: Associate Product Manager
experience.description: • Built Ninjacart "Auctioneer App" - Marketplace Model that connects Agri Auctioneers to Customers• Developed in-house webapp order management/inventory management product for Ninjacart Groceries Business• Handled Order Management tools, Warehouse/DC App, Logistics/Driver App• Executed system and product integration for Flipkart – Ninjacart B2C Fresh produce• Built in-house payment webapp for Agri Traders/Millers to do Bulk Payments, scaled it to ~3000 users• Created product flowcharts(Whimsical) and wireframes (Figma) for the "Ninja" App• Built the “Ninja” fintech app for managing trades, reconciliation, pay & collect, ~10,000+ downloads
experience.description_html: • Built Ninjacart "Auctioneer App" - Marketplace Model that connects Agri Auctioneers to Customers• Developed in-house webapp order management/inventory management product for Ninjacart Groceries Business• Handled Order Management tools, Warehouse/DC App, Logistics/Driver App• Executed system and product integration for Flipkart – Ninjacart B2C Fresh produce• Built in-house payment webapp for Agri Traders/Millers to do Bulk Payments, scaled it to ~3000 users• Created product flowcharts(Whimsical) and wireframes (Figma) for the "Ninja" App• Built the “Ninja” fintech app for managing trades, reconciliation, pay & collect, ~10,000+ downloads

experience.title: Management Trainee
experience.description: • Built credit assessment digital product for the finance team to perform automated CRA & underwriting• Developed “Ofbusiness” App for customers to apply for the Purchase Finance credit/loans, 50,000+ downloads• Designed Order tracking solutions to track end to end supply chain of raw material distribution/deliveries• Onboarded 100+ Infra clients with active Bank Guarantee limits onto the fin-tech platform• Coordinated with operations team & client to deliver raw materials like steel, cement within the TAT
experience.description_html: • Built credit assessment digital product for the finance team to perform automated CRA & underwriting• Developed “Ofbusiness” App for customers to apply for the Purchase Finance credit/loans, 50,000+ downloads• Designed Order tracking solutions to track end to end supply chain of raw material distribution/deliveries• Onboarded 100+ Infra clients with active Bank Guarantee limits onto the fin-tech platform• Coordinated with operations team & client to deliver raw materials like steel, cement within the TAT

experience.title: Summer Internship
experience.description: Growing Reefer (Refrigerated Containers) Business for Maersk's Pharmaceutical Vertical• Worked with Pharma Giants like Sun Pharma, Cipla, Glenmark etc to understand the pain points in Pharmaceutical Shipping• Estimated the Market Size and Market Potential of Reefer Market in India• Increased the refrigerated container market share by capturing business from air pharma shipping by offering better shipping solutions at cheaper cost• Drove revenue growth in the Reefer business via new product offerings like "LCL Shipping Model"• Optimized product portfolio and pricing strategies to improve profit margins for Reefer services• Launched IoT based temperature-controlled tracking systems and Remote Container Management (RCM), enhancing customer satisfaction and retention
experience.description_html: Growing Reefer (Refrigerated Containers) Business for Maersk's Pharmaceutical Vertical• Worked with Pharma Giants like Sun Pharma, Cipla, Glenmark etc to understand the pain points in Pharmaceutical Shipping• Estimated the Market Size and Market Potential of Reefer Market in India• Increased the refrigerated container market share by capturing business from air pharma shipping by offering better shipping solutions at cheaper cost• Drove revenue growth in the Reefer business via new product offerings like "LCL Shipping Model"• Optimized product portfolio and pricing strategies to improve profit margins for Reefer services• Launched IoT based temperature-controlled tracking systems and Remote Container Management (RCM), enhancing customer satisfaction and retention

recommendations: Nikhila A “Suriya is an amazing person to work with. He is such a "smart cookie" that he is very solution oriented with exceptional problem solving skills. Suriya’s deeper understanding of the technical nuances always helped me in countless ways. His fantastic managerial skills always astonish me. He has a very impressive profile and I recommend suriya as a expert to connect with and consider for anything appropriate. All the very best for your future endeavors...”

R.V.S. Prasad, Ph.D, Pr.Eng “I know Suriya during his internship at GE since 2017. He is one of the best and most enthusiastic student, I ever encountered. He is very meticulous and systematic in excuting the technical projects. I am sure he will do his best to any work or project, whichever he works on. I strongly recommend him for any position he is aspiring. Wishing you a very best and successful future ahead Suriya ”

volunteer_experience.info:
Quarks - is an official annual magazine produced by the undergraduate students of Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore. It is funded by the IISc UG Press every year. Quarks gives you the complete picture of the life of an undergraduate student at IISc. With features ranging from Poetry, Stories, Real life Incidents at IISc, Paintings, Drawings, Interviews and latest information of the campus, Quarks is definetely a favourite Magazine for students of IISc as well as to students who aspire to…

Quarks gives you the complete picture of the life of an undergraduate student at IISc.
